queries.sql: SET usePlannerRules='JoinToEnrichedJoin'; SELECT {t1}.col2 + {t2}.col2 AS result FROM {t1} JOIN {t2} ON {t1}.col1 = {t2}.col1 ORDER BY result

queries.description: enriched left join with one projection
queries.sql: SET usePlannerRules='JoinToEnrichedJoin'; SELECT {t1}.col2 + CASE WHEN {t2}.col2 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE {t2}.col2 END AS result FROM {t1} LEFT JOIN {t2} ON {t1}.col1 = {t2}.col1 ORDER BY result

queries.description: enriched right join with one projection
queries.sql: SET usePlannerRules='JoinToEnrichedJoin'; SELECT CASE WHEN {t1}.col2 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE {t1}.col2 END + {t2}.col2 AS result FROM {t1} RIGHT JOIN {t2} ON {t1}.col1 = {t2}.col1 ORDER BY result
SET usePlannerRules='JoinToEnrichedJoin'; SELECT {t1}.col2 AS result FROM {t1} WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM {t2} WHERE {t1}.col1 = {t2}.col1) LIMIT 1

queries.description: enriched join with one projection and limit
queries.sql: SET usePlannerRules='JoinToEnrichedJoin'; SELECT {t1}.col2 + {t2}.col2 AS result FROM {t1} JOIN {t2} ON {t1}.col1 = {t2}.col1 WHERE {t1}.col2=1 LIMIT 1

SET usePlannerRules='JoinToEnrichedJoin'; SELECT sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 AS result FROM (SELECT {t1}.col2 + {t2}.col2 + {t1}.col2 + {t2}.col2 + {t1}.col2 + {t2}.col2 + {t1}.col2 + {t2}.col2 + {t1}.col2 + {t2}.col2 AS sum5 FROM {t1} JOIN {t2} ON {t1}.col1 = {t2}.col1) ORDER BY sum5

queries.description: enriched join with two projects and a filter
queries.sql: SET usePlannerRules='JoinToEnrichedJoin'; SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT {t1}.col2 + {t2}.col2 + {t1}.col2 + {t2}.col2 + {t1}.col2 + {t2}.col2 + {t1}.col2 + {t2}.col2 + {t1}.col2 + {t2}.col2 AS sum5 FROM {t1} JOIN {t2} ON {t1}.col1 = {t2}.col1)) WHERE sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 + sum5 < 300
